pr_title: Make sure Maven commands use the effective project deps, props and managed deps

timeline.bodyText: @aloubyansky  Are the suppliers reading the file each time they are called?
timeline.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: They are supposed to be invoked once to initialize the fields on demand. But I see I didn't do this for the properties.
replies.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: Just mind that that they have to be up to date after using install/uninstall
replies.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: The state of the BuildFile will be up to date. Otherwise the maven will have to be re-launched.
replies.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: Ah, private Properties projectPropsSupplier; is not actually a supplier. I should just rename the field.
replies.author: aloubyansky
